printer_recommendations: Local print shop with booklet capabilities

quality_checks.description: All text is readable at final size
All images are 300 DPI or higher
Content extends properly into bleed area
No important content in center fold area

printing_instructions: Print double-sided on 100lb gloss text paper
Fold pages in half to create booklet format
Staple along the center fold (saddle stitch)
Trim edges if necessary for clean finish
Quality check colors against digital proof

troubleshooting.color_issues: Ensure monitor is calibrated and viewing PDFs in CMYK mode
troubleshooting.text_cutoff: Check bleed settings and safe area margins
troubleshooting.alignment_problems: Verify crop marks are properly set
troubleshooting.folding_issues: Confirm center fold safe zone is respected

additional_notes: This checklist was generated by GOAT's automated production system
For best results, use a professional print service
Keep digital files as backups for future reprints
Test print a single copy before full run if possible
